description:
'''Angra''' is a Brazilian [[power metal]] and [[progressive metal]] band formed in 1991. They have released ten regular studio albums, six [[Extended play|EP]]s, and seven live CD/DVDs to date. Led by Rafael Bittencourt, the band has gained a degree of popularity in Japan and Europe.

On 2 April 2015, guitarist [[Kiko Loureiro]] left Angra to join American thrash metal band [[Megadeth]].
